    • ClientHandlerRMI

      public ClientHandlerRMI(GamesController controller, Server server, VirtualClientRMI virtualClient) throws RemoteException
      Construct a ClientHandler that connects to the client via RMI
      Parameters:
      controller - of the game
      server - to subscribe to
      virtualClient - reference to the client, used to call RMI methods on
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong during connection
